data.actual_result: Separate screen pops up, saying "Hole (since I created the inv link) has invited you to join _" with the Join button, even though you are already in the server.
data.expected_result: You should be led to the channel the invite link was made for.
data.short_description: Invite links for server you already joined leads you to the separate "Join server" screen.
data.steps_to_repro: - Send an invite link for the server you are currently in on one of the servers channel - Click on it.
